    Basic Usage Feed Analysis Interaction with Platform Networks

Function reference

All functions

auth()
Authenticate for the API
follow() unfollow()
Un/Follow an account
get_feed()
Get the skeets from a specific feed
get_feed_likes()
Get likes of a feed
get_feeds_created_by()
A view of the feed created by an actor.
get_followers() get_follows()
Get followers and follows of an actor
get_lexicon()
Download new lexicon and save it into the inst folder
get_likes() get_reposts()
Get likes/reposts of a skeet
get_own_timeline()
Get your own timeline
get_replies()
Get all replies
get_skeets_authored_by()
A view of an actor's skeets.
get_thread()
Get all skeets in a thread
get_user_info()
Query profile of an actor
github_ls()
List all files in github subfolders up to a certain depth
list_lexicons
AT Protocol Lexicons
post() post_skeet() delete_skeet() delete_post()
Post a skeet
post_thread()
Post a thread
print(<bsky_token>)
Print token
read_lexicon()
Download new lexicon and save it into the inst folder
regexs
Regular expressions to match mentions and URLs
search_feed()
Search a specific feed
search_post()
Search Posts
search_user()
Find users (profiles) matching search criteria.
